blocks.content: A Label is not an active component of a workflow, in the sense that users do no interact with it. It is used to create headers to a workflow section or to synthesize a question asked to users in order not to repeat unnecessary information. On the Template a Label comprises of a chunk of text that will be displayed as is when users run the template.

points.text: Choose where you want to put the Label Step in the orange bar below
Add Label text to the input field
Validate the Step by clicking the green tick:

blocks.caption: A Label was created to separate the different phases of a surgical procedures SOP. It allows to visually create a separator between the different section of this template.

Under the same template, another Label was used to synthesize a piece of information that would otherwise be repeated, in this case “Does the patient have a”, making the template easier to read and to act upon.
